Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of PRRA decision and removal order
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness by PRRA officer due to lack of application update after two-year delay
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, section 113(a)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Alleged new risk deemed implausible based on prior RPD findings
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Lack of new or updated evidence from applicant
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 113(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Failure to update application during processing delay
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's failure to provide updated information
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to submit updated evidence or request deferral
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None – applicant failed to provide evidence
Crimes.Legal_Standard: No duty for PRRA officers to solicit updates
Crimes.Authority: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), CBSA
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of new evidence in PRRA application
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Claim of increased risk considered implausible
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of oral deferral request not accepted
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Delay in processing and lack of applicant follow-up

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Fairness in PRRA assessment following overstayed visa
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, sections 96 and 97
Crimes.Application_Facts: Ms. Tovar remained in Canada after visa expiry and applied for PRRA
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: PRRA application denied, removal order issued
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of PRRA decision and removal order
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Failed to provide updated evidence or comply with immigration status
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged increased risk upon return to home country
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Assessment based on new evidence; no duty to solicit updates
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Two-year delay partly attributable to applicant inaction
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Prior RPD decision, lack of new documentation
Crimes.Application_Basis: PRRA application based on fear of return
Crimes.Governing_Rule: PRRA eligibility requires new evidence of risk
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: No updated information provided during delay
Crimes.Cause_Description: Overstay led to inadmissibility and removal process
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: No obligation to seek out new evidence from applicant
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: No new basis for protection found

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to comply with removal order
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness by PRRA and removal officers
Crimes.Application_Facts: Removal order issued after failed refugee claim and PRRA
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Failed to leave Canada per removal order; claimed oral deferral request
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged practical impediments and unprocessed deferral
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Limited discretion of removal officers to defer removal
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Absence of formal deferral request and lack of evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Deferral claim not supported by evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Removal interview records, absence of written request
Crimes.Application_Basis: Challenge to lawfulness of removal process
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: No confirmation of deferral request received
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Removal officers may defer only for practical impediments
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: No proof of formal deferral request
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Potential hardship upon removal not outweighing compliance
Crimes.Cause_Description: Refugee claim denied → PRRA failed → removal ordered → non-compliance
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Reliance on official records of communication
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Violated: Section 44(1), IRPA (failure to comply with removal order)
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Oral request not documented or verified
Crimes.Residency_Compliance: Failure to adhere to removal directive
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA, sections related to removal enforcement
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Official records prioritized over unverified claims
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: No procedural unfairness; discretion properly exercised
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroboration for oral deferral claim

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of PRRA and removal decisions
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Procedural fairness in PRRA assessment amid marriage fraud concerns
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Increased personal risk claim viewed with skepticism
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Lack of corroborating documentation for changed circumstances
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA provisions on PRRA and admissibility
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution linked to alleged sham marriage consequences
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Credibility and plausibility of new risk
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to disclose or substantiate changes
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to update application with relevant personal changes
Crimes.Legal_Standard: No duty to prompt applicant for updates
Crimes.Application_Factor: History of denied refugee claim and potential marriage irregularities
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Alleged unfairness in not updating file
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that oral requests were disregarded
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to inform authorities of personal changes

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Alleged breach of procedural fairness by PRRA and removal officers
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Based on existing record without solicitation of updates
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to demonstrate new risk or grounds for deferral
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Implausibility of new claims given prior findings
Crimes.Legal_Rule: PRRA officers assess based on submitted evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Delay in processing and lack of applicant engagement
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Allegation of unfair treatment due to delayed decision
Crimes.Review_Standard: Reasonableness for PRRA, correctness for legal questions
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: No duty to update file absent new submissions
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Prior RPD decision, lack of new documentation
Crimes.Legal_Rule_Source: IRPA and case law on procedural fairness
Crimes.Standard_of_Proof: Balance of probabilities for new risk claims
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Certification of question, suspension of removal
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA provisions on PRRA and removal
